name: The $100 Box
overview: This one is based on a mathematics game theory problem for 100 people, but the game simulates the problem with just one player. The computer selects a random number from 1 to 100 as your lucky number. You will need to guess which box from 00-99 where the lucky number is hidden. The game allows you to have up to 50 guesses, but it's not easy to win as it sounds! Published as part of the 2018 C64 4KB Game Coding Competition
